00071 llvm::Constant *LLVMMaskAllOff = NULL;

00074 void
00075 InitLLVMUtil(llvm::LLVMContext *ctx, Target target) {
00076     LLVMTypes::VoidType = llvm::Type::getVoidTy(*ctx);
00077     LLVMTypes::VoidPointerType = llvm::PointerType::get(llvm::Type::getInt8Ty(*ctx), 0);
00078     LLVMTypes::BoolType = llvm::Type::getInt1Ty(*ctx);
00079     LLVMTypes::Int8Type = llvm::Type::getInt8Ty(*ctx);
00080     LLVMTypes::Int16Type = llvm::Type::getInt16Ty(*ctx);
00081     LLVMTypes::Int32Type = llvm::Type::getInt32Ty(*ctx);
00082     LLVMTypes::Int32PointerType = llvm::PointerType::get(LLVMTypes::Int32Type, 0);
00083     LLVMTypes::Int64Type = llvm::Type::getInt64Ty(*ctx);
00084     LLVMTypes::Int64PointerType = llvm::PointerType::get(LLVMTypes::Int64Type, 0);
00085     LLVMTypes::FloatType = llvm::Type::getFloatTy(*ctx);
00086     LLVMTypes::FloatPointerType = llvm::PointerType::get(LLVMTypes::FloatType, 0);
00087     LLVMTypes::DoubleType = llvm::Type::getDoubleTy(*ctx);
00088     LLVMTypes::DoublePointerType = llvm::PointerType::get(LLVMTypes::DoubleType, 0);
00089 
00090     // Note that both the mask and bool vectors are vector of int32s
00091     // (not i1s).  LLVM ends up generating much better SSE code with
00092     // this representation.
00093     LLVMTypes::MaskType = LLVMTypes::BoolVectorType =
00094         llvm::VectorType::get(llvm::Type::getInt32Ty(*ctx), target.vectorWidth);
00095 
00096     LLVMTypes::Int1VectorType = 
00097         llvm::VectorType::get(llvm::Type::getInt1Ty(*ctx), target.vectorWidth);
00098     LLVMTypes::Int32VectorType = 
00099         llvm::VectorType::get(LLVMTypes::Int32Type, target.vectorWidth);
00100     LLVMTypes::Int32VectorPointerType = llvm::PointerType::get(LLVMTypes::Int32VectorType, 0);
00101     LLVMTypes::Int64VectorType = 
00102         llvm::VectorType::get(LLVMTypes::Int64Type, target.vectorWidth);
00103     LLVMTypes::Int64VectorPointerType = llvm::PointerType::get(LLVMTypes::Int64VectorType, 0);
00104     LLVMTypes::FloatVectorType = 
00105         llvm::VectorType::get(LLVMTypes::FloatType, target.vectorWidth);
00106     LLVMTypes::FloatVectorPointerType = llvm::PointerType::get(LLVMTypes::FloatVectorType, 0);
00107     LLVMTypes::DoubleVectorType = 
00108         llvm::VectorType::get(LLVMTypes::DoubleType, target.vectorWidth);
00109     LLVMTypes::DoubleVectorPointerType = llvm::PointerType::get(LLVMTypes::DoubleVectorType, 0);
00110     LLVMTypes::VoidPointerVectorType = 
00111         llvm::ArrayType::get(LLVMTypes::VoidPointerType, target.vectorWidth);
00112 
00113     LLVMTrue = llvm::ConstantInt::getTrue(*ctx);
00114     LLVMFalse = llvm::ConstantInt::getFalse(*ctx);
00115 
00116     std::vector<llvm::Constant *> maskOnes;
00117     llvm::Constant *onMask = NULL;
00118     onMask = llvm::ConstantInt::get(llvm::Type::getInt32Ty(*ctx), -1,
00119                                     true /*signed*/); // 0xffffffff
00120 
00121     for (int i = 0; i < target.vectorWidth; ++i)
00122         maskOnes.push_back(onMask);
00123     LLVMMaskAllOn = llvm::ConstantVector::get(maskOnes);
00124 
00125     std::vector<llvm::Constant *> maskZeros;
00126     llvm::Constant *offMask = NULL;
00127     offMask = llvm::ConstantInt::get(llvm::Type::getInt32Ty(*ctx), 0,
00128                                      true /*signed*/);
00129 
00130     for (int i = 0; i < target.vectorWidth; ++i)
00131         maskZeros.push_back(offMask);
00132     LLVMMaskAllOff = llvm::ConstantVector::get(maskZeros);
00133 }
00134 
00135 
00136 llvm::ConstantInt *LLVMInt32(int32_t ival) {
00137     return llvm::ConstantInt::get(llvm::Type::getInt32Ty(*g->ctx), ival,
00138                                   true /*signed*/);
00139 }

00142 llvm::ConstantInt *
00143 LLVMUInt32(uint32_t ival) {
00144     return llvm::ConstantInt::get(llvm::Type::getInt32Ty(*g->ctx), ival,
00145                                   false /*unsigned*/);
00146 }

00150 LLVMInt64(int64_t ival) {

00152                                   true /*signed*/);

00164 LLVMFloat(float fval) {
00165     return llvm::ConstantFP::get(llvm::Type::getFloatTy(*g->ctx), fval);
00166 }

00169 llvm::Constant *
00170 LLVMDouble(double dval) {
00171     return llvm::ConstantFP::get(llvm::Type::getDoubleTy(*g->ctx), dval);
00172 }

00175 llvm::Constant *
00176 LLVMInt32Vector(int32_t ival) {
00177     llvm::Constant *v = LLVMInt32(ival);
00178     std::vector<llvm::Constant *> vals;
00179     for (int i = 0; i < g->target.vectorWidth; ++i)
00180         vals.push_back(v);
00181     return llvm::ConstantVector::get(vals);
00182 }
00183 
00184 
00185 llvm::Constant *
00186 LLVMInt32Vector(const int32_t *ivec) {
00187     std::vector<llvm::Constant *> vals;
00188     for (int i = 0; i < g->target.vectorWidth; ++i)
00189         vals.push_back(LLVMInt32(ivec[i]));
00190     return llvm::ConstantVector::get(vals);
00191 }

00280 llvm::Constant *

00288 
00289 llvm::Constant *
00290 LLVMBoolVector(bool b) {
00291     llvm::Constant *v;
00292     if (LLVMTypes::BoolVectorType == LLVMTypes::Int32VectorType) 
00293         v = llvm::ConstantInt::get(LLVMTypes::Int32Type, b ? 0xffffffff : 0, 
00294                                    false /*unsigned*/);
00295     else {
00296         assert(LLVMTypes::BoolVectorType->getElementType() == 
00297                llvm::Type::getInt1Ty(*g->ctx));
00298         v = b ? LLVMTrue : LLVMFalse;
00299     }
00300 
00301     std::vector<llvm::Constant *> vals;
00302     for (int i = 0; i < g->target.vectorWidth; ++i)
00303         vals.push_back(v);
00304     return llvm::ConstantVector::get(vals);
00305 }
00306 
00307 
00308 llvm::Constant *
00309 LLVMBoolVector(const bool *bvec) {
00310     std::vector<llvm::Constant *> vals;
00311     for (int i = 0; i < g->target.vectorWidth; ++i) {
00312         llvm::Constant *v;
00313         if (LLVMTypes::BoolVectorType == LLVMTypes::Int32VectorType) 
00314             v = llvm::ConstantInt::get(LLVMTypes::Int32Type, bvec[i] ? 0xffffffff : 0, 
00315                                        false /*unsigned*/);
00316         else {
00317             assert(LLVMTypes::BoolVectorType->getElementType() == 
00318                    llvm::Type::getInt1Ty(*g->ctx));
00319             v = bvec[i] ? LLVMTrue : LLVMFalse;
00320         }
00321 
00322         vals.push_back(v);
00323     }
00324     return llvm::ConstantVector::get(vals);
00325 }

00327 
00328 const llvm::ArrayType *
00329 LLVMPointerVectorType(const llvm::Type *t) {
00330     // NOTE: ArrayType, not VectorType
00331     return llvm::ArrayType::get(llvm::PointerType::get(t, 0), 
00332                                 g->target.vectorWidth);
00333 }
